name: Pumpkin Muffins II
author: Julie
summary: Fresh pumpkin puree makes for great muffins. Can also be served as a loaf.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners
Place on baking sheet, cut side down
Cover with foil and bake in preheated oven until tender, about 90 minutes
Remove pumpkin pulp and puree in blender
Measure out 2 cups pumpkin puree; set aside
In a large bowl, stir together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, cloves, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice and salt
In a separate bowl, beat together 2 cups pumpkin puree, vegetable oil and eggs
Stir pumpkin mixture into flour mixture until smooth
Scoop batter into prepared muffin cups
Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean
